label: 凌雲集
本: The Weaving of Mantra:  Kūkai and the Construction of Esoteric Buddhist Discourse . Columbia University Press . 1999
説明文: An imperial anthology of Chinese poems compiled under the aegis of Emperor Saga in about 815, [edited by] eminent statesman Ono no Minemori (778-830) (p. 305). [嵯峨天皇、小野岑守]
